
=head1 NAME

ref_type

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 name (character varying(64)) - 
 table (character varying(64)) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                          Table "gcis_metadata.ref_type"
  Column |         Type          |                       Modifiers                       | Storage  | Description 
 --------+-----------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------+-------------
  id     | integer               | not null default nextval('ref_type_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    | 
  name   | character varying(64) |                                                       | extended | 
  table  | character varying(64) |                                                       | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "ref_type_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "publication_ref" CONSTRAINT "publication_ref_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (type) REFERENCES ref_type(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
